document.full_text: authorities issued a security alert on friday at an elementary school in the san fernando valley area of los angeles as police searched the vicinity for a murder suspect, police and school officials said.
document.title: los angeles school "locked down" for manhunt
lines_and_colors: authorities issued a security alert on friday at an elementary school in the san fernando valley area of los angeles as police searched the vicinity for a murder suspect, police and school officials said.
